targets.expr: sum(rate(http_requests_total{status!~"^5..$", container="$app_kubernetes_io_name", endpoint=~".*", method=~".*", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum (rate(http_requests_total{container="$app_kubernetes_io_name", endpoint=~".*", method=~".*", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
